description:
Dell Command Update is a stand-alone application for systems that provides updates for system software that is released by Dell. This application simplifies the BIOS, firmware, driver, and application update experience for Dell client hardware.


- Added Support for executing Inventory Collector
- Added a check for DUP Framework to handle Reboot Pending Required ReturnCode
- Sending all telemetry events as optional
- Added a new UI that is displayed when launching Dell Command Update.
- Added support to download the driver package to the operating system during the Advance Driver Restore operation.
